name: Robert C
text: An absolute gem of a store that offers try-before-you-buy gourmet Olive oils and Balsamic vinaigrette. Olive oils this fresh are hard to find and the infused options are an awesome way to mix it up. There is also a huge variety of balsamic vinaigrette with quality you'll never find at a local grocery store. I was also pleased to find bread dipping spices to add to the oil. Prices are very reasonable and the staff make you feel like family!

resp.text: Thanks Robert! So glad you came by, we love coming up with & sharing recipe ideas & flavor combinations. Glad you like our bread dipping spice blend, it's one of our favorites!

name: Debbie Dunaway
text: This is an incredible place for balsamic vinegars and infused olive oils. The owner is very knowledgeable and helpful. Great for gifts.

name: Gerard
text:
I have thanked the owner twice for opening a store like this in Montgomery. It is a wonderful treasure if one enjoys food or cooking. I love to cook and I feel I know something about olive oil and balsamic vinegar but she knows far more than I will ever know. It is an extremely wonderful treat for Montgomery. Now we do not have to commute to Atlanta, New Orleans or New York City for extremely high quality olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Thank you to both owners!!!

resp.text: Wow, thank you so much Gerard! So very glad you’ve enjoyed using our products, cheers to great food!

name: Philip Lerner
text: Excellent place

name: Larry Summons
text: I absolutely love to cook, I was pleasantly surprised to find this location. A wide variety of olive oils and balsamic vinegars, and my personal favorite the Foco charcoal! Our last visit was amazing, sampling different balsamic flavors and exploring the possibilities for future dishes.

resp.text: Thank you so much Larry! We love when you sample so you can experiment & know you'll love what you get, there are so many ideas!

name: Marion Ackley
text: When I hand you my money hand me back my money don't ever put my money on the counter. Happy Thanksgiving

resp.text: We apologize Marion. At the time it appeared you were looking for something in your purse so I placed it on the counter for you to get at your convenience while I finished packaging your order for you. Sorry if I misread the situation and that you felt offended, that would NEVER be our intention.

name: Anita Rabidou
text: This place is amazing! If you are looking to add flavor to your life check out the wide array of vinegar and oils they have to offer.

resp.text: Thank you so much Anita! Always good to see you, glad you're enjoying everything, thanks again!

name: Janet May
text: I just love this shop. Friendly staff and great products!!

resp.text: Thank you Janet!

name: Casey M
text: This husband / wife owner combo are so friendly and welcoming. Whether it is your first visit, or your 30th time to come back for refills, they treat everyone like family. I enjoy exploring different flavors each time but my all time favorite is the Granny Smith Apple Balsamic.  It is delicious!  They have so many flavors of both olive oil and balsamic that you become inspired to cook a masterpiece just walking in the store.  They also offer a nice selection of unique and locally made gifts.  This is a must see while exploring historic downtown Oxford!!

resp.text: We are so grateful for your kind words of encouragement Casey M!  You had such a kind spirit about you in the store that made serving you a pleasure!  Granny Smith Apple Balsamic is one of our favorites too!  It’s almost like eating an apple in the field!  And yes, all the oils and vinegars are constantly sparking us to create new recipes too!  It’s people like you who inspire us to serve our local community!

name: Judy Papic
text: Great variety of flavored olive oils and vinegars

resp.text: Thank you! We truly appreciate you!!

name: mr weasel1
text: Great products, great products, and great customer service! There were so many tasty things to get here. The lady helping us was just the sweetest and super easy to talk to. Great place! We will be coming back there!

resp.text: Thank you so much for stopping by! We truly appreciate your business!

name: Ann Wilson
text: Boy have I missed my Olive Oil - just couldn't remember to stop!

resp.text: We truly appreciate you!

name: Jody Dalton
text: incredibly unique selection with a friendly and knowledgeable staff

resp.text: Thank you so much! We are so glad you chose to shop with us & truly appreciate your business!

name: Josh Hale
text: Highly recommended!

name: Nicole F
text: My husband and I popped into this quaint little store during my recent Memorial Day weekend visit to Oxford and was kindly greeted by staff who offered for me to taste test their infused olive oils and balsamic vinegar's. They were absolutely delicious, and I ended up purchasing bottles to take home. I have enjoyed them each day since and will be a repeat customer! Yum!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words!   We are glad you enjoyed tasting our oils and balsamics in the store and each day since then!  We look forward to serving you in the future!

name: Kayln Hess
text: This locally own shop is a true gem. They have everything from salsas to artisian oils. Their jams are imaginative and delicious. The staff are friendly and knowledgeable. Anytime I need a special gift for someone I stop in and normally I pick something up for myself as well!

name: Roger Mcclellan
text: Great selection and friendly service

resp.text: Thank you so much! We truly appreciate you!

name: Grace Dyal
text: A great selection of olive oils. Great service

name: Aleshia Wiley
text: Great ppl & great oil, vinegar and olives

name: Rickey Moore
text: Great selections of favored olive oils

name: Kim Holmes
text: I was beyond blessed to receive a gift set of your oils for Christmas.  They are beyond incredible. Whatever culinary dish you are preparing will be brought to the next level of awesome with these products.

resp.text: Thank you Kim, we appreciate it! We love what we do in cooking, meeting people who also love to cook. Let us know if there is anything that you need. You can even go to our site www.olivefruitstore.com. We are updating the site with new products so if you don't see what you need you can always call us at either shop. Enterprise 334 464 9726 or Dothan 334 446 4598. thank you again! Louis and Jackie

name: Pia Lee
text: Just discovered this GEM by walking by, so glad we stopped in. We are adding amazing flavor to our foods now.  Owners are so wonderful and kind, we will be returning again and again.  You get to taste all the different Oils, the infused give a wonderful flavor to your dish. There is also the healthy table that has different oil for health benefits.    Worth stopping by....

resp.text:
Thank you Pia we appreciate you stopping into our shop. Thank for your comments and the picture as well. We love what we do and hope to see you soon again.

If you are in the area this weekend we are having a Healthy Eating Day at our Dothan shop on Saturday from 1:30 to 3:30 with local vendors. Eves Garden Raw Food Café, Well rooted CBD Oil, and Hawkins Homestead Farm (fresh vegetable growers from Kinsey AL) As well The Wokman who makes custom made Woks and he will be doing some cooking outside with fresh veggies! See you soon!

name: Terri Dewald
text:
Oh my goodness! This olive oil and balsamic vinegar store is awesome! Lewis, is very knowledgeable about oils and vinegars and has wonderful suggestions on how to pair and used the products.
This is a very welcoming store!

resp.text:
Hi Terri thank you so much we love to taste, cook, and invite others to a healthier way of eating as well meeting people that love the same.
Thank you and stop by anytime.

name: Anne Powe
text: Awesome experience!  So many choices, friendly and helpful people, will definitely have to visit again via wesite!

name: Mark Vickers
text: Staff is very helpful and the products and choices are excellent

name: D R
text: Wonderful owner that will tell you all about the different olive oils. We have been a customer for several years. I was amazed at the difference between cheap grocery store oil and real oil.

name: david myrick
text: The products are amazing great service super nice people. I highly recommend this place. My wife fell in Love with the uniqueness of the shop.

resp.text: Thank you Kerry for stopping by our shop appreciate you.  Stop back when ever you get a chance were always doing something new!

name: Suzanne Dick
text:
Lovely shop.  Set-up perfect for both tasting & viewing of all oils & vinegars.
Met Louis & Jackie Cameron, Owners.  Made my girlfriend and I most welcome.  We are both Red Hat Chapter, Queens and he then explained they have a private room that could be made available for our chapter meetings or schedule a private tasting for our chapterettes as well.

The tasting of the differnt oils that I personally was interested in was a wonderful experience not to mention I purchased those that I loved the best.

If you have not experienced this type of venue for goodness sakes go for something unique and new that is now available here in Dothan.

Dothan has another great place to experience and take home something different that makes your palate want more!

I personally think Dothan has a hit!

Loved it
Suzanne Dick

name: rick bell
text: Good selection.  Surprising variety

name: Kenneth S
text: Went here with my family while I was on vacation. The olive oils that they have here are amazing. I really enjoyed the taste testing that they have available here. I will definitely have to have my parents send my olive oils from here.

name: Brandy Halverson
text: I can't remember the sales person names but it was friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable.  I enjoyed shopping here. I already have recommended to many people ava plan to return. I love all the oils and vingerettes. I highly recommend!!

name: kiesha
text: It was a great experience !!  Owners were very nice and knowledgeable about the products

resp.text: Thank you Zakeisha for stopping by our shop appreciate you.  Stop back when ever you get a chance were always doing something new!

name: Teri Curtis
text: So many different oil and vinegar options, they also have a great assortment of spices for cooking.

name: Liz Olliff
text: Good selection. Helpful, friendly service.

name: Tiffany Wesley (601Beauty)
text: I'm over the moon with this store! I can't wait to go back and try more delicious vinaigrettes and olive oils!

name: Kerry Hamrick
text: Love the varieties of oil and balsamics

resp.text: Thank you Kerry for stopping by our shop appreciate you.  Stop back when ever you get a chance were always doing something new!

name: Karla Messenger
text: The assortment of vinegars and oils are mind boggling!  And the spice packets for mixing with oil will change your mind on cooking.

resp.text: Thank you Karla for stopping by our shop appreciate you.  Stop back when ever you get a chance were always doing something new!

name: Andrew Thomas
text: Extremely nice and very tasty.
